actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code increasing income limitations relating to payment of disability and death pension, and dependency and indemnity compensation.

summary.text: Increases payments in specified amounts to veterans under non-service connected disability pension plans. Increases pensions payments to widows of veterans who, at the time of death, were receiving compensation or retirement pay for a service-connected disability. Increases dependency and indemnity compensation to parents of deceased veterans. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 52(b), (c); 541(b), (c); 415(b), (c), (d))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code increasing income limitations relating to payment of disability and death pension, and dependency and indemnity compensation.
